name: Galápagos Islands
description: The Galápagos Islands are known for their unique biodiversity and volcanic landscapes. Perfect for ecotourism and observing endemic species like giant tortoises.

name: Middle of the World
address: San Antonio de Pichincha, Quito, Ecuador
description: An iconic monument marking the equator line. A cultural and tourist site celebrating Ecuador's unique geographic location.

name: Cotopaxi National Park
description: Home to the Cotopaxi volcano, one of the highest active volcanoes in the world. Ideal for hiking and enjoying Andean landscapes.

name: Otavalo Market
description: A vibrant indigenous market famous for its colorful textiles, handicrafts, and ancestral traditions.

name: Baños de Agua Santa
description: A tourist city surrounded by mountains, known for its waterfalls, hot springs, and adventure activities like bungee jumping and rafting.

name: Malecón 2000
description: A modern boardwalk along the Guayas River with gardens, monuments, museums, and family entertainment areas.

name: El Cajas National Park
description: A highland park filled with páramos and glacial lagoons. A perfect place for hiking and nature exploration.

name: Historic Center of Quito
description: A UNESCO World Heritage Site with colonial churches, historic plazas, and museums. The cultural and spiritual heart of Ecuador.
